text: [Muso] Guft: «Pas, ʙirav. Be tardid, ʙahrai tu dar zindagi in ast, ki [cunon matrud savi, ki ʙa mardum] ʙigui: «[Ba man] Dast nazaned»; va va'dagohe [ʙaroi azoʙ] xohi dost, ki hargiz az on taxalluf naxohad sud; va [aknun] ʙa on ma'ʙude, ki pajvasta dar iʙodatas ʙudi, ʙingar; onro mesuzonem, on goh [ki komilan xokistar sud,] dar darjo parokandaas mesozem»
